thread.title: Apple Offers Free Beats Solo3 Headphones for Chinese New Year
thread.title_full: Apple Offers Free Beats Solo3 Headphones for Chinese New Year

author: Evan Selleck
title: Apple Offers Free Beats Solo3 Headphones for Chinese New Year
text:
Apple Offers Free Beats Solo3 Headphones for Chinese New Year Posted by Evan Selleck on Jan 02, 2017 | No Comments Shares 10 
Apple has officially revealed its promotion for the Chinese New Year, which kicks off later this week. 
Apple has updated its landing page for the Chinese New Year, confirming that it will also be running a limited-time promotion for those who buy specific Apple-branded products for the New Year. Apple’s page now reads at the top, “New Year. New Beats.” followed by a quick snippet of text that confirms the one-day sale: 
“For one day only, get the latest Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones – Red when you buy select Mac or iPhone models, including iPhone 7.” 
The promotion will be available to those who live in Taiwan, Hong Kong, China, and Singapore, and begins at 8:00am local time on Friday, January 6. Customers must buy an iMac, a MacBook, MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, or a Mac Pro to be eligible. The MacBook Pro with Touch Bar is not included in the deal. 
The iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7, and the iPhone 7 Plus all qualify for the free pair of Beats Solo3 on-ear headphones.
